data.title: 2016 - South Pacific Islands - Nouméa Pacific Dawn
data.meta_description:
P & O Pacific Dawn arrived in Nouméa New Caledonia mid afternoon.  Being smaller it got to park at the pier closest to the city centre.
	
	Nouméa Cruise Port Terminal is located at the city center. The terminal has a beth for one small ship at Port Moselle Marina.
	
	Nouméa Cruise Port can’t take two cruise ships simultaneously. In those situation one berths at the container terminal and the passengers are transported to the Noumea Cruise Terminal by free buses - that would be ms Noordam this day.
	
	PACIFIC DAWN;
	Is owned and operated by P&O Cruises Australia. It was built in 1991 by the Fincantieri shipyard in Monfalcone, Italy as Regal Princess. The ship was ordered by Sitmar Cruises, but delivered to Princess Cruises, and later sold to the fleet of P&O Cruises Australia.
	
	After a multimillion-dollar refurbishment in Singapore from Regal Princess to Pacific Dawn, it operates from Australia to South Pacific destinations. Her renaming coincided with P&O's 75th anniversary in Australia.
data.text:
P & O Pacific Dawn arrived in Nouméa New Caledonia mid afternoon. Being smaller it got to park at the pier closest to the city centre.

Nouméa Cruise Port Terminal is located at the city center. The terminal has a beth for one small ship at Port Moselle Marina.

Nouméa Cruise Port can’t take two cruise ships simultaneously. In those situation one berths at the container terminal and the passengers are transported to the Noumea Cruise Terminal by free buses - that would be ms Noordam this day.

PACIFIC DAWN;

Is owned and operated by P&O Cruises Australia. It was built in 1991 by the Fincantieri shipyard in Monfalcone, Italy as Regal Princess. The ship was ordered by Sitmar Cruises, but delivered to Princess Cruises, and later sold to the fleet of P&O Cruises Australia.

After a multimillion-dollar refurbishment in Singapore from Regal Princess to Pacific Dawn, it operates from Australia to South Pacific destinations. Her renaming coincided with P&O's 75th anniversary in Australia.
